backend/main.mo: Main backend canister defining user profiles, posts, stories, messages, notifications, announcements, and access control with storage mixins and comparison utilities.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module providing a no-op run function for initialization.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report describing a frontend reliability feature with related files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing prewritten summaries of various frontend source files.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT.md: Deployment guide detailing production failure causes, fixes, and pre-deployment checklist items.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind-based style definitions including theme variables and dark mode mappings.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point setting metadata, manifest, icons, and bootstrapping the main script.
frontend/public/manifest.webmanifest: PWA manifest specifying app metadata, colors, start URL, and icon assets.
frontend/public/sw.js: Service worker implementing resilient caching, versioned cache cleanup, fetch handling, and skip-waiting messaging.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React app configuring routes, shells, startup handling, authentication gates, and service worker registration.
frontend/src/components/announcements/An: Fetches announcements and displays the latest one in a styled banner with timestamp.
frontend/src/components/posts/CommentsDr: Provides a slide-in drawer to view and submit comments on a post, including author info and validation.
frontend/src/components/posts/CreatePost: Dialog for creating posts with text and optional media upload, including preview and progress tracking.
Floating action button that opens the post creation dialog.
frontend/src/components/posts/FeedList.t: Loads and displays the full list of posts with loading, error, and refresh handling.
Renders images or auto-playing videos with loading states and manual play controls.
frontend/src/components/posts/PostCard.t: Displays an individual post with author info, media, likes, comments, sharing, and delete actions.
frontend/src/components/posts/TrendingPo: Shows top-liked posts as a trending list, with loading skeletons and fallback handling.
frontend/src/components/profile/EditProf: Dialog allowing users to edit profile fields and upload a new profile picture with progress tracking.
frontend/src/components/stories/CreateSt: Form for creating a new story with optional image upload and preview.
frontend/src/components/stories/StoriesR: Displays a horizontal list of story bubbles grouped by author and includes a button to create new stories.
frontend/src/components/system/ErrorBoun: Class-based boundary that catches rendering errors and shows a recovery screen.
frontend/src/components/system/GlassSurf: Reusable glass-style container components with variants for default, card, and navigation.
frontend/src/components/system/NavIcon.t: Navigation icon component that falls back to predefined icons when image loading fails.
frontend/src/components/system/PageState: Common UI states including loading indicators, error messages, empty states, and skeleton cards.
frontend/src/components/system/PageTrans: Wraps pages with a fade-in animation keyed to the current route.
frontend/src/components/system/RoleBadge: Renders decorative badges for admin and owner roles.
frontend/src/components/system/SplashScr: Animated splash screen with branding shown on app launch.
frontend/src/components/system/StartupSc: Displays startup progress phases and errors with retry support during app initialization.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Provides a React Query hook that creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor, invalidating related queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements an Internet Identity context and provider handling authentication, identity loading, and login state management.
frontend/src/hooks/usePatchedActor.ts: Similar to useActor but with retry logic, this hook creates a backend actor tied to the current identity and refreshes dependent queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and mutating user profiles and related backend data using the patched actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind-based global stylesheet defining a premium dark theme, gradients, and glassmorphism utility classes.
frontend/src/layout/AppShell.tsx: App layout component providing navigation, user profile info, unread counts, and periodic last‑seen updates.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Entry point that initializes React, sets up QueryClient, Internet Identity provider, and mounts the app.
frontend/src/pages/access/AccessCodeGate: Displays an access‑code gate UI that validates a code and unlocks the app upon success.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminDashboardP: Admin dashboard that loads users, posts, stats and provides actions to ban/unban users, delete posts, and create announcements.
frontend/src/pages/auth/AuthGate.tsx: Authentication gate that switches between login, signup, and profile setup based on identity and profile fetch state.
frontend/src/pages/auth/LoginPage.tsx: Login screen using Internet Identity with loading state, error handling, and a link to switch to signup.
frontend/src/pages/auth/ProfileSetupPage: Profile setup form that submits user details to the backend and redirects to home after success.
frontend/src/pages/auth/SignupPage.tsx: Signup screen that triggers Internet Identity login and allows switching back to login.
frontend/src/pages/home/HomePage.tsx: Home feed page showing posts and a dialog trigger for creating a new post.
frontend/src/pages/messages/Conversation: Conversation view that loads messages, marks them as read, and allows sending new messages to a user.
frontend/src/pages/messages/MessagesPage: Messages overview listing all conversations and navigating to individual chat threads.
frontend/src/pages/notifications/Notific: Displays a notifications list with loading skeletons and allows marking notifications as read.
frontend/src/pages/onboarding/Onboarding: Shows a multi-slide onboarding flow with images, navigation, and a completion handler.
frontend/src/pages/profile/ProfilePage.t: Loads and displays a user's profile and posts with edit, messaging, and error handling states.
frontend/src/pages/search/SearchPage.tsx: Provides a debounced user search with results, loading skeletons, and navigation to profiles or messages.
frontend/src/pages/settings/SettingsPage: Shows user settings including profile info, theme selection, admin role management, and logout.
frontend/src/pages/stories/StoriesPage.t: Displays active stories, a create-story option, and handles story navigation with loading states.
frontend/src/pages/stories/StoryViewerPa: Story viewer UI that cycles through active stories with timed progress, navigation, and author header display.
frontend/src/utils/accessCodeGate.ts: Handles simple access-code lock state using localStorage with a hardcoded code check.
frontend/src/utils/onboarding.ts: Tracks onboarding completion state via localStorage.
frontend/src/utils/pwa.ts: Registers and manages service worker updates, including auto-reload on new worker activation.
frontend/src/utils/startup.ts: Provides startup phase tracking, timeout helpers, and detailed error classification/logging.
frontend/src/utils/time.ts: Formats timestamps for relative display and determines online status based on recency.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility for reading, storing, and persisting URL parameters across navigation using sessionStorage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending theme colors, fonts, animations, and shadows.
project_state.json: Describes project state, issues, and feature requests related to profile loading and backend authorization.
